name: SaltIntake
title: Salt Intake
description: Documentation of the amount of salt/sodium the person consumes (Business ID: Entry 2729865)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Salt Intake.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an documentation of the amount of salt/sodium the person consumes.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes for Salt Intake.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Salt Intake.)

contains.display: Estimated quantity of intake of sodium in 24 hours (observable entity)
